scripts.dev: npm run generate && concurrently --names "ROLLUP,SASS,HTTP" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "rollup -c -w -m inline" "sass src/scss:public/assets/css --embed-source-map --watch" "servez public"
scripts.build: npm run generate && rollup -c && sass src/scss:public/assets/css --no-source-map --style compressed
